DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy diclofenac potassium 25 mg tablet compare placebo take three time day subject acute ankle sprain 'in-use ' condition , particular regard pain relief .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Diclofenac Potassium 25 mg Tablet Taken Three Times Daily Subjects With Acute Joint Pain
DOC.criteria: Male female age 18 year . Acute sprain lateral ankle , Grade III , meet baseline pain intensity level . Injury within past 12 hour . Pain medication take within 6 hour precede randomization . During past 3 month : Grade IIII sprain ankle . During past 6 month : Grade IIIII sprain , significant injury ( fracture tear ligament ) , surgery ( except skin nail ) ankle foot . Pain instability ankle attributable previous ankle sprain trauma . Ankle sprain attributable known disease affect ligament , ligament hyperlaxity due connective tissue disease ( e.g. , Marfan 's syndrome , Down 's syndrome , EhlersDanlos syndrome ) .
